channel.title: GitHub OCaml Monthly Trending
channel.description: Monthly Trending of OCaml in GitHub

item.title: semgrep/semgrep
item.description: Lightweight static analysis for many languages. Find bug variants with patterns that look like source code.

item.title: rocq-prover/rocq
item.description: The Rocq Prover is an interactive theorem prover, or proof assistant. It provides a formal language to write mathematical definitions, executable algorithms and theorems together with an environment for semi-interactive development of machine-checked proofs.

item.title: opengrep/opengrep
item.description: ðŸ”Ž Static code analysis engine to find security issues in code.

item.title: terrateamio/terrateam
item.description: Terrateam is open-source GitOps infrastructure orchestration. It integrates with GitHub to automate Terraform, OpenTofu, CDKTF, Terragrunt, and Pulumi workflows through pull requests.

item.title: facebook/infer
item.description: A static analyzer for Java, C, C++, and Objective-C

item.title: Alex23087/Perk
item.description: Modern low level programming language designed for kernel development

item.title: ocaml/ocaml
item.description: The core OCaml system: compilers, runtime system, base libraries
